Posts.Content: Had the DIEP last summer,tummy tuck with breast reconstruction,however,have unresolved seroma in abdomen,have had 3 guided aspirations with ultrasound.A further 2 aspirations,and 2 more lots of surgery.....opening up old scar.Still there,and has now gone into pickets with lots of tissue and has capsulated.More or less told this is it now,so left with swollen abdomen.Just another op to gave drain inserted and then steroid injection....anyone else have this problem?
Posts.Title: Seroma in tummy after DIEP

Posts.Content: Thankyou Alert Moderator.....yes,so unusual,that one other case is known in the East Anglia region,and hers resolved using blue dye and cauterising ......certainly will go to  GP....if need be.Feel rather alone in all this.
Posts.Title: Seroma in tummy after DIEP

Posts.Content: To cut a long story short,I had removal of Silicone implant 5 weeks ago,due to infection, there was a bleb on the strattice, which was sorted, then still did not heal,subsequently silicone implant removed. Now appear to have scar tissue and seroma,and still have a leaking open wound. The strattice meshes in with the tissue,I believe. Is this he cause of the leaking I wonder?any one else have this problem?seeing BCN on Monday.
Posts.Title: Strattice
